title: Nuncius infernalis, or, A new account from below in two dialogues : the first from the Elizium Fields, of friendship : the second from hell of cuckoldom : being the sessions of cuckolds / by Charles Gildon ... ; with a preface by Mr. Durfey.
author: Gildon, Charles, 1665-1724.
notes: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
